casebody.data:
MISSISSIPPI STATE CONFERENCE OF the NATIONAL ASSOCIATION FOR THE ADVANCEMENT OF COLORED PEOPLE, et al., appellants,
v.
Phil BRYANT, Governor of Mississippi, et al. No. 12-1019. Supreme Court of the United States May 20, 2013. *2390On Appeal from the United States District Court for the Southern District of Mississippi. Judgment Affirmed.

No opinion found.Click here to view source material.
